creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage; interior of a studio apartment with orange bed; orange, fuchsia, and tan rug; man wearing glasses and a striped shirt seated on a floral couch at left; close-up of a woman looking toward seated man, wearing a white blouse, medallion necklace, and blue jacket, with a hand holding a pink glass, at right; man in orange jacket behind woman; black borders
signed: LLC in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 Circumstance of Appearance
title: Circumstances of Appearance
